# Christian Books Sales Page - Next.js Project

This is a Next.js project for a Christian pastor's book sales page with focus on faith, peace, hope, and joy. The project uses App Router and Tailwind CSS with a clean, elegant design optimized for conversions.

## Key Features
- Hero section with responsive layout (2-column desktop, stacked mobile)
- Christian color palette: #2F5D8C (blue), #3A7D44 (green), #C9A44C (gold), #F7F6F2 (background)
- Typography: Playfair Display for headings, Inter for body text
- Accessibility-focused design
- Subtle animations for engagement

## Development Guidelines
- Use App Router exclusively
- Component-based architecture
- No external UI libraries
- Tailwind CSS for all styling
- Clean, semantic HTML structure
- Mobile-first responsive design
